title: Efficient Business Establishment
description: In 2024, Georgia achieved an impressive score of 95.5 in operational efficiency for establishing a business location, showcasing its conducive environment for new businesses.

title: Top-tier Financial Services Efficiency
description: Georgia's operational efficiency in receiving financial services reached a remarkable score of 98.23 in 2024, highlighting its robust financial infrastructure.

title: High Urban Population Concentration
description: As of 2024, Georgia has one of the lowest populations in urban agglomerations over 1 million, with only 1,084,471 people, indicating a more dispersed urban population.

title: Strong Business Location Appeal
description: In 2024, Georgia scored 83.01 in the overall business location index, reflecting its attractiveness for businesses seeking new locations.

title: Notable Female Educational Attainment
description: By 2023, 27.39% of Georgian women aged 25 and above had attained at least a Master's degree, underscoring the country's commitment to female education.

title: High Current Education Expenditure
description: In 2023, Georgia allocated 38.20% of its total expenditure in public institutions to current education, one of the highest percentages globally.

title: Competitive Labor Market
description: Georgia's labor market scored 83.46 in 2024, indicating a competitive and efficient workforce environment.
